title: [BUG] Too many scrollbars in experiment view

labels.name: area/uiux
labels.description: Front-end, user experience, plotting, JavaScript, JavaScript dev server

body:
### Willingness to contribute

- [ ] Yes. I can contribute a fix for this bug independently.

### System information
- **Have I written custom code (as opposed to using a stock example script provided in MLflow)**: no
- **OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04)**: docker python:3.10-slim-buster
- **MLflow installed from (source or binary)**: binary, `pip install mlflow`
- **MLflow version (run ``mlflow --version``)**: 1.22.0
- **Python version**: 3.10
- **npm version, if running the dev UI**: -
- **Exact command to reproduce**: -

### Describe the problem
Too many scrollbars - see picture. 

![image (2)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/432235/144043532-4ba68106-13b0-46f7-8b16-0eab612864b8.png)

I believe this line to blame: https://github.com/mlflow/mlflow/blob/d79a81671f50bf2b4d3105160912fbbee742cdec/mlflow/server/js/src/experiment-tracking/components/ExperimentView.css#L332
